## Proc Means

Working example
```
PROC MEANS DATA = iris
  N MEAN MIN MAX;
  VAR Sepal.Length;
RUN;
```

Error expected: missing data
```
PROC MEANS
  N MEAN MIN MAX;
  VAR Sepal.Length;
RUN;
```

Warning: stats un-specified
```
PROC MEANS DATA = iris;
  VAR Sepal.Length;
RUN;
```
